cause.description:
Camp South Africa began in 2002, and occurs every November and December. It has grown to the point where hundreds of children each year are able to take part in CSA.
During our daycamps, children are provided with food, games, crafts, singing, and a message.
Our week-long camps provide much of the same on a greater scale.
Check out www.myspace.com/campsouthafrica for videos and more information
1. Our mission is to be a place of healing and hope for the New South Africa, where people meet with the Creator and are inspired to contribute towards the empowerment of all who are spiritually, socially, or economically challenged.
